summary: the study of dengue exhibits an overall upward trend from 1872 to 2015. the leading countries in dengue research were the USA (4,709; 24.05 %), India (1,942; 9.92 %), Brazil (1,530; 7.81 %), Thailand (1,260; 6.43 %), the UK (1,129; 5.77 %), and France (1,087; 5.55 %) the arab world produced fewer publications related to dengue with lower quality. the arab world produced fewer publications related to dengue.
